defaultRestaurants.name: Panda Express
defaultRestaurants.description: Panda Express serves gourmet Chinese food made with only the freshest ingredients. Famous for its Orange Chicken, they also offer a number of Wok Smart entrées that contain less than 250 calories per serving, such as Shanghai Angus Steak, Kung Pao Chicken, and Broccoli Beef. Other favorites include Beijing Beef, Sweetfire Chicken Breast, and Honey Walnut Shrimp.

defaultRestaurants.name: L&L Hawaiian Barbecue
defaultRestaurants.description: Delicious local and Asian-American fusion cuisine served in big portions at reasonable prices! Try delicious L&L favorites like the Hawaiian Barbecue beef, chicken, or short ribs! Enjoy L&L’s famous fried chicken katsu, the best in town! Grab-and-go, breakfast items and party packs for groups also available.

defaultFeatureds.name: Peppermint Mocha
defaultFeatureds.description: Our all-star festive Peppermint Mocha brightens the holidays: signature Espresso Roast combines with steamed milk, sweet mocha sauce, peppermint-flavored syrup, topped with whipped cream and dark chocolate curls.

defaultFeatureds.name: Loco Moco
defaultFeatureds.description: Savory hamburger patties over rice, topped with brown gravy and 2 fresh fried eggs.

defaultFeatureds.name: Orange Chicken
defaultFeatureds.description: Our signature dish. Crispy chicken wok-tossed in a sweet and spicy orange sauce.

defaultFeatureds.name: Breakfast of Champions Crepe
defaultFeatureds.description: Includes egg, cheese, turkey bacon, mushrooms and organic garlic. With your choice of homemade crepe batter.
